SetupDone: Dictates if the the setup process was completed.
ProjectsFolder: The path to the project folder where LunaForge will store its projects.
SelectedLayout: The layout that is currently selected for the LunaForge interface.
BypassLauncher: Bypasses the Launcher and starts the editor without opening anything else.
ProjectAuthor: The name of the author of the project. This is used for metadata purposes.
UseDiscordRPC: If enabled, LunaForge will show a Discord Rich Presence while the application is running.
